public class ErrorWindow extends Window

    Description

    The constructor used for instantiating a window to display an error message to the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • ErrorWindow

      public ErrorWindow(Exception e)
      The constructor used for instantiating a window to display an error message to the user.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception that will be used to generate the error message that will be displayed.

    • ErrorWindow

      public ErrorWindow(String... message)
      Alternate constructor for generating notification messages. Can be useful for when an error needs to be thrown, but with no legitimate exception
      Parameters:
      message - the string that will be used when displaying the error window. .
